episodes.synopsis: Attenborough's hidden cameras get up-close and personal with polar bears, whose intelligence and intrepid nature is matched only by their ferocity.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: The second part of this series continues the intimate journey with polar bears as they hunt and survive extreme conditions in Norway's Arctic islands.
episodes.title: Episode 2

video.title: Polar Bear: Spy on the Ice
video.synopsis: State-of-the-art spy cameras track polar bears in Norway, revealing the daily life, curiosity and intelligence of the massive and beautiful predators.
